title: Disgraced Light Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to attack the target of a player of your choice.
- Use 2 bees to rampage attack a player.
- Use 3 bees to use an ability of another Fallen Angel role of your choice, and it acts as if its Sin attribute was applied.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- If you attack a Fallen Angel, you will also attack all their visitors.
- If you attack a non-Fallen Angel, you will also short-circuit them.
**Sin of Bees** — If you're the last Fallen Angel remaining, you instead get 6 bees every night and may multitask.
